chapters.title: Chapter 5: The Forging of a Hammer
chapters.info: Jur Grady, p. 171 (195)—Stocky, dark-eyed man, about seven years older than Perrin. Now one of the Asha'man. He accompanied Rand after the episode at Dumai's Wells, and later left with Perrin to seek out Masema. He looks like a farmer.
